bikes.description: A giant lizard terrorizes a rural Texas community and a heroic teenager attempts to destroy the creature.
A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.
An inventor comes up with a time machine, but must prevent its abuse at the hands of an evil C.E.O.
A young man meets a farm girl who is actually a witch.
The Martians kidnap Santa Claus because there is nobody on Mars to give their children presents.
A young man is transformed into a hideous 'moon beast' due to a meteor fragment lodged in his body.
